_header: Saint Mary Magdalene that God forgave her sin
Subjects: saints’ lives; Mary Magdalene, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Mary Magdalene in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynt Marie magdaleyn þat god uor ȝef hire sunneLazare
                    soster & martha In come of kynges kunne…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou seynt Marie Magdaleyn þat broȝte hire lif þus
                    to endeBidde god þat we mote wiþ hire to þe Ioie of heuene
                    wende

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint mary maudeleyn þat god forȝaf here sinnelasarus
                    soster & martha þey come of kingus kinne…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…now mary magdalen þat þus brouȝt here lyf to
                    endebidde god þat we moot wit here to þe ioy of heuin
                    wende

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Saynet Mary Mawdlayne þat god forgafe hir synneLaȝar
                    sistre & Martha als þai come of kyngeȝ kynneMawdleyne was sho
                    calde þis gude woman Maryffor of þe castel of Magd[ ]le sho was
                    tuo myle fro betany…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Þou bliste maudeleyne þat lufed mekil ihesu criste
                    goddeȝ sonneGrant vs þurgh þi prayer in heuen blis to
                    wonne
